PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-08042021-08-04272018,  FIN,  ,  , 
ActBudget Implementation Act, 2018, No. 2
SubjectOrder Fixing June 30, 2022 as the Day on Which Certain Provisions of that Act Come into Force
PrecisOrder fixing June 30, 2022 as the day on which sections 315 to 330 and 333 to 335 and subsection 336(2) of the new BUDGET IMPLEMENTATION ACT, 2018, NO. 2, chapter 27 of the Statutes of Canada, 2018, COME INTO FORCE in order to implement the new Financial Consumer Protection Framework (Framework), as amended in the BANK ACT.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2021-0042 Publication Date: 2021-08-18
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Order Fixing June 30, 2022 as the Day on Which Certain Provisions of that Act Come into Force
precis: Order fixing June 30, 2022 as the day on which sections 315 to 330 and 333 to 335 and subsection 336(2) of the new BUDGET IMPLEMENTATION ACT, 2018, NO. 2, chapter 27 of the Statutes of Canada, 2018, COME INTO FORCE in order to implement the new Financial Consumer Protection Framework (Framework), as amended in the BANK ACT.
